name: goldbot-sachs
author: publu
desc: Yield infrastructure for AI agents. Deposit idle USDC into clawUSDC vault on Base. 4.12% APY, auto-compounding via Beefy + Morpho.

name: aave-sentinel
author: publu
desc: Monitor Aave v3 positions across 9 chains. Health factor tracking, risk classification, multi-chain scanning. No wallet needed.

name: morpho-sentinel
author: publu
desc: Browse Morpho Blue lending markets, curated vaults, and monitor positions. Supply APYs, vault comparison, position health tracking.

name: hyperliquid-sentinel
author: publu
desc: Monitor Hyperliquid perpetual positions, spot balances, funding rates, and market data. Real-time perp analytics.

name: lighter-sentinel
author: publu
desc: Browse Lighter zero-fee perp markets, check positions, funding rates. 157 markets: crypto, forex, commodities, equities.

name: polymarket-skill
author: publu
desc: Browse and trade on Polymarket prediction markets. Prices, order books, positions, and trading via the official Polymarket CLI.
